member.name: P:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.ResourceAccess.NavigationHelper
member.summary: NavigationHelper is used on each page to aid in navigation and process lifetime management

member.name: P:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.ResourceAccess.DefaultViewModel
member.summary: This can be changed to a strongly typed view model.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.ResourceAccess.NavigationHelper_LoadState(System.Object,BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.LoadStateEventArgs)
member.summary: Populates the page with content passed during navigation. Any saved state is also provided when recreating a page from a prior session.
member.param: The source of the event; typically

Event data that provides both the navigation parameter passed to when this page was initially requested and a dictionary of state preserved by this page during an earlier session. The state will be null the first time a page is visited.

members.member:
The methods provided in this section are simply used to allow NavigationHelper to respond to the page's navigation methods.
Page specific logic should be placed in event handlers for the
and . The navigation parameter is available in the LoadState method in addition to page state preserved during an earlier session.

member.name: T:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.ResourceAccess
member.summary: A page that displays details for a single item within a group while allowing gestures to flip through other items belonging to the same group.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.NavigationHelper.CoreDispatcher_AcceleratorKeyActivated(Windows.UI.Core.CoreDispatcher,Windows.UI.Core.AcceleratorKeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked on every keystroke, including system keys such as Alt key combinations, when this page is active and occupies the entire window. Used to detect keyboard navigation between pages even when the page itself doesn't have focus.
member.param: Instance that triggered the event.
Event data describing the conditions that led to the event.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.NavigationHelper.CoreWindow_PointerPressed(Windows.UI.Core.CoreWindow,Windows.UI.Core.PointerEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked on every mouse click, touch screen tap, or equivalent interaction when this page is active and occupies the entire window. Used to detect browser-style next and previous mouse button clicks to navigate between pages.
member.param: Instance that triggered the event.
Event data describing the conditions that led to the event.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.NavigationHelper.OnNavigatedTo(Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when this page is about to be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. The Parameter property provides the group to be displayed.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.NavigationHelper.OnNavigatedFrom(Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when this page will no longer be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. The Parameter property provides the group to be displayed.

member.name: P:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.SuspensionManager.SessionState
member.summary: Provides access to global session state for the current session. This state is serialized by and restored by , so values must be serializable by and should be as compact as possible. Strings and other self-contained data types are strongly recommended.

member.name: P:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.SuspensionManager.KnownTypes
member.summary: List of custom types provided to the when reading and writing session state. Initially empty, additional types may be added to customize the serialization process.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.SuspensionManager.SaveAsync
member.summary: Save the current . Any instances registered with will also preserve their current navigation stack, which in turn gives their active an opportunity to save its state.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that reflects when session state has been saved.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.SuspensionManager.RestoreAsync
member.summary: Restores previously saved . Any instances registered with will also restore their prior navigation state, which in turn gives their active an opportunity restore its state.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that reflects when session state has been read. The content of should not be relied upon until this task completes.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.SuspensionManager.RegisterFrame(Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Frame,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a instance to allow its navigation history to be saved to and restored from . Frames should be registered once immediately after creation if they will participate in session state management. Upon registration if state has already been restored for the specified key the navigation history will immediately be restored. Subsequent invocations of will also restore navigation history.
member.param: An instance whose navigation history should be managed by
A unique key into used to store navigation-related information.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.SuspensionManager.UnregisterFrame(Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Frame)
member.summary: Disassociates a previously registered by from . Any navigation state previously captured will be removed.
member.param: An instance whose navigation history should no longer be managed.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.SuspensionManager.SessionStateForFrame(Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Frame)
member.summary: Provides storage for session state associated with the specified . Frames that have been previously registered with have their session state saved and restored automatically as a part of the global . Frames that are not registered have transient state that can still be useful when restoring pages that have been discarded from the navigation cache.
member.remarks: Apps may choose to rely on to manage page-specific state instead of working with frame session state directly.
member.param: The instance for which session state is desired.
member.returns: A collection of state subject to the same serialization mechanism as .

member.name: T:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.SuspensionManager
member.summary: SuspensionManager captures global session state to simplify process lifetime management for an application. Note that session state will be automatically cleared under a variety of conditions and should only be used to store information that would be convenient to carry across sessions, but that should be discarded when an application crashes or is upgraded.

member.name: T:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Data.SampleDataItem
member.summary: Generic item data model.

member.name: T:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Data.SampleDataGroup
member.summary: Generic group data model.

member.name: T:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Data.SampleDataSource
member.summary:
Creates a collection of groups and items with content read from a static json file.
SampleDataSource initializes with data read from a static json file included in the project. This provides sample data at both design-time and run-time.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.App.OnLaunched(Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used when the application is launched to open a specific file, to display search results, and so forth.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: M:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.App.OnSuspending(System.Object,Windows.ApplicationModel.SuspendingEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when application execution is being suspended. Application state is saved without knowing whether the application will be terminated or resumed with the contents of memory still intact.
member.param: The source of the suspend request.
Details about the suspend request.

member.name: T:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.

member.name: T:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.ObservableDictionary
member.summary: Implementation of IObservableMap that supports reentrancy for use as a default view model.

member.name: T:BW8AGU.Samples.VB.Common.BooleanToVisibilityConverter
member.summary: Value converter that translates true to and false to .
